Who are
Prague Photographers?

A Band born out of passion and love for the city.

It Started As A Passion And Became A Mission.

We are passionate about photography, and we care about people - that's what makes us Prague Photographers. Instead of offering regular photoshoots, we focus on delivering exciting photo experiences.

It all started in 2017, when we decided to combine our creative photography skills with openness and love for people. The Prague Photographers agency was born out of our desire to help you make wonderful memories, and then capture them in beautiful pictures. Our aim is not only to create visual souvenirs from your journey, but also to make your time in Prague unforgettable.

What connects our team is creativity, professionalism, and care for people. At the same time, each of our photographers has their unique aesthetics and original ideas, and is ready to help you embrace your own style.
